price: Inni namicha Rabbi irratti soba odeessu malee waan biraa miti, Nuti isaaf amanoowwan hin taane.”
arabic: إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا رَجُلٌ ٱفۡتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبٗا وَمَا نَحۡنُ لَهُۥ بِمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: in huwa illā rajulun if'tarā ʿalā al-lahi kadhiban wamā naḥnu lahu bimu'minīna
